md5 lib from:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/libmd5-rfc/

Various local modifications were made.

http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/libmd5-rfc/libmd5-rfc/2002-04-13/md5.tar.gz

The project seems to be dead as of 2016.
